article_title: Kim Dotcom: I Don't Believe in 'Copyright Extremism'
article_text: Connecting decision makers to a dynamic network of information, people and ideas, Bloomberg quickly and accurately delivers business and financial information, news and insight around the world.

article_metadata.description: Megaupload founder Kim Dotcom comments on copyright law and sharing content during an interview with Bloomberg's Emily Chang on "Studio 1.0." The full interview airs Thursday, May 14 at 7:30 p.m. ET. (Source: Bloomberg)
